aboutContent: Abba Gospel ni ikinyamakuru gikwirakwiza ubutumwa bwiza bwa Yesu Kristo ku isi hose. Dukoresha amakuru, ibinyamakuru, radiyo, televiziyo n’imbuga nkoranyambaga zitandukanye. Twibanda ku gushimangira indangagaciro n’amahame ya Gikristo.
missionContent: Abagalatiya 4: 6-7: "Kandi kuko muri abana bayo, ni cyo cyatumye Imana yohereza Umwuka w’Umwana wayo mu mitima yacu avuga ati ‘Aba, Data.’ Ni cyo gituma utakiri imbata ahubwo uri umwana, kandi rero ubwo uri umwana, uri n’umuragwa ubihawe n’Imana."
vissionContent: Zaburi 96: 3: "Mwogeze icyubahiro cye mu mahanga, Imirimo itangaza yakoze muyogeze mu mahanga yose."
footerContent: Menya amakuru y’iyobokamana, umuziki ukunda n’ibiganiro bya televiziyo kuri Abba Gospel. Tukugezaho amakuru agezweho n’ibiganiro byiza byerekeye iyobokamana.
